mapper.sql: photo_id, invoice_id, file_name, pos_longitude, pos_latitude, pos_height, photo_user_cd, photo_tm, upload_tm, memo, check_tm, check_user_cd, status_cd
mapper.insert: insert into d_invoice_image ( photo_id, invoice_id, file_name, pos_longitude, pos_latitude, pos_height, photo_user_cd, photo_tm, upload_tm, memo, check_tm, check_user_cd, status_cd ) values ( #{photoId}, #{invoiceId}, #{fileName}, #{posLongitude}, #{posLatitude}, #{posHeight}, #{photoUserCd}, #{photoTm}, #{uploadTm}, #{memo}, #{checkTm}, #{checkUserCd}, #{statusCd} )
mapper.update:
update d_invoice_image
invoice_id = #{invoiceId},
file_name = #{fileName},
pos_longitude = #{posLongitude},
pos_latitude = #{posLatitude},
pos_height = #{posHeight},
photo_user_cd = #{photoUserCd},
photo_tm = #{photoTm},
upload_tm = #{uploadTm},
memo = #{memo},
check_tm = #{checkTm},
check_user_cd = #{checkUserCd},
status_cd = #{statusCd}
where photo_id = #{photoId}
